website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a fun party toy will appreciate this product's  shaped connectors and unique designs.
pros: Glow stick connectors can create eyeglasses, flowers, balls, bracelets, and butterfly  shapes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glow Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my Halloween party and they were great! They glowed for at least 6 hours and the colors were very vibrant. The glasses and attachments worked well and were a big hit. I saved all of the glasses for next time, they're well made and can definitely be reused. The only downside is that there's no indication of the colors and it's very hard to tell before activating them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P Phillippi

customer_reviews.title: Colorful with lots of options!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of 8" glow sticks included in this kit, including a lot of pieces to make special shapes and glasses. There are 7 colors: yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, red (pinkish red), and orange. There were most of yellow and orange, followed by pink and green. There were least of the purple (looks light pink before snapped) and blue (looks clear before snapped). Adults can wear the glasses but they don't stay on as well as they stay on people with smaller heads (the legs barely reach adult ears). The 8" glow sticks allow flexibility to make bracelets, necklaces, headbands, or whatever else you want to make. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Could have more bang for your buck elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: While I can appreciate it’s all being put together the kit simply doesn’t go as far as one would like from a lot of this size. For 200 items, with some pieces needing as many as 12 sticks, you only end up with around 40 items total. A mixture of other sizes I’ve put together on my own ordering from other companies definitely got me more bang for my buck. I’d recommend doing this if you have the time the money saved it well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JB PopEggs

customer_reviews.title: Not all bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn't shop around & this set came recommended because of the abundance. There are a lot of pieces. Price is affordable. Tried about 10 sticks and they've been glowing for 2 days now! We like the ideas to build glasses, bracelets and use as lights on bike. Thought sticks would be longer for one piece necklaces but that's my bad since pictures showed otherwise. Not all glow sticks are as vibrant but colors are pretty. I will see kids' responses at bday party this weekend. Used the set as part of giftbbags. Helped me save $ for that at least =)
customer_reviews.author: Peoria

customer_reviews.title: Great little set of glow sticks
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of glow sticks. Kids liked the variety of colors since it is beyond the usual yellow/green, but also had orange, blue, pink. The connectors allowed the kids to create their own glasses, bracelets, pinwheels and more and added a lot of festivity to our event for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Solice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: A few of the glow sticks worked and stayed on for a long time. However, a whole package of the 8inch sticks didn't work and neither did the ones that are for necklaces--that's over 100 non-working glowsticks at a outdoor campout. The yellow part for the eye glasses that snaps on the sticks also broke easily so most of the glasses could not be made. We had a dozen very disappointed girl scouts as a result of these defective glow sticks. The only reason it gets two stars is because the few sticks that did work, seemed to stay glowing for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roll

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Party Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for children to assemble and play with for fun. There were many moving parts but assembled very easily. I hosted a graduation party in my backyard complete with catering and a smore's roast. I knew the children invited needed something fun to do while the adults enjoyed themselves. These were the perfect activity for ages 4- teenager. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Richeal

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Movie theater birthday party.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's 6th birthday party. We did a movie theater party and everyone (teenagers included) had fun making the different shapes and projects. There were pleanty of glow sticks and connectors and they were a hit. I could be wrong, but I felt they should "glow" longer than they did. But I could have unrealistic expectations. The kit did exceed my expectations though. Added fun to our party.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun glowsticks
customer_reviews.text: Typical glow stick expectancy. Bought these to take camping. The kids loved it. They made other designs and even snapped them on their bike wheels at night, it was a win win since we could watch them at night.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Mann

customer_reviews.title: Good to great quality. Order these here instead of buying at brick and mortar stores!
customer_reviews.text: 200 total glowsticks 100 come in a tube so the box you get has 2 tubes. Each tube has the standard connector pieces and outside of the tubes, there is a bag with butterfly bracelets, glasses, and ball connectors. Some of the connecting pieces (receiving) aren't 100% big enough so some pieces here and there will continuously pop out. Glasses are less than perfect, but that's to be expected with something like this. Colors are: yellow, orange, pink, red, blue, green. Very bright, a good shine lasts about 4 hours before starting to fade.
customer_reviews.author: DB.

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Glow Stick Dance
customer_reviews.text: We used 2 packs for a glow stick dance for our wedding reception. I ended up putting together individual bags of “projects” (glasses, ball, bracelets, necklace, etc), which I think helped for this kind of event. Guests didn’t seem to have any issues putting them together, and in fact got pretty creative! They seemed to dim pretty quickly though from their original brightness. I accidentally activated a few while putting together the bags, and they were noticeably dimmer after even hour, but still glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor T.

customer_reviews.title: Actually two sets of 100
customer_reviews.text: meh, this was an okay kit and kids had fun for the time it took to assemble. Eyeglasses are too wide to fit kids under 6 or even 8 in one case. Aren't hooked enough to stay over ears. I was disappointed it wasn't a 200 piece kit with more things to make vs. just two tubes of 100 pcs. Glow disappeared by next day.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous but they arrived unbroken
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous ordering glow sticks on the web given they could be activated via shipping, but they are well packed to ensure the sticks are protected. They arrive with two tubes, each with 100 sticks, then the two tubes are inside another box which also contains the plastic bits.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Childers

customer_reviews.title: Great Glowsticks Kit!
customer_reviews.text: There was a nice variety of glowstick options and the accompanying necklaces, glasses, connectors, etc. The colors were vibrant and lasted a good amount of time. They were fun for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna D

customer_reviews.title: Fun but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Lots of glow sticks but A LOT of them busted open and I had glass (or whatever it is inside the glow sticks) stuck in my hand when I went to wipe off the glowing substance. So just be careful with these
customer_reviews.author: Amber_401

customer_reviews.title: Fun item for nighttime and glow in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our glow in the dark party in our hotel room and the kids though it was a great idea. All the sticks worked well and were lit brightly. Kids had fun for a cheap price. The kids really enjoyed making the glasses and spheres with the added materials that come with the sticks. The connectors didn’t always work too well holding the sticks together when you made braclets, but it’s a minor thing. Overall the kids enjoyed running around in the room with the glow sticks. They glowed brightly for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as treats for Halloween we were the hit of the neighbourhood!! Look for more hidden links taped inside the lid of each cylinder!!!!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Glow sticks break easily
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product zero stars if I could. More of these glow sticks than I could count kept breaking all over my kids and everything else as they as they tried to put them into glasses and other items. I’be bought many kits before and even ones from the Dollar Store and I’ve never had this problem. They are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Merseyside3000

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of connectors! almost too many due to ratio to glow bits
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for the $, but don't buy it for the "Glasses".
customer_reviews.text: Great Pack for the $! Got this for a kids Glow party and huge success. The glow sticks lasted longer than another brand of necklaces I bought. I'm giving it a 4 star because the "glasses" are not the best. Kids & Adults couldn't keep them on their heads, so no one wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect
customer_reviews.text: No single connectors at all. Were able to make ball shapes. Were given 24 sets of eye glass ear pieces🙄 Most lit easily. Color good and lasted a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Petrea Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t glow very good
customer_reviews.text: Quarter of the box didn’t glow and the rest glowed but not very bright. Was disappointed with glow sticks. Nice accessories but they need better glow sticks That actually glow.
customer_reviews.author: Tambra Massingale

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for New Year’s Eve during a family reunion. There were ten kids ranging from 1 - 6 years old and these were a hit with everyone (and with the parents after the kids went to bed!) Such a great deal for 200 glow sticks, plus cool and basic connecting pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a lightning deal so I couldn’t pass up the chance to get it. Seriously though I would have bought it if it wasn’t! It has so much! My kids are excited to use them all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Glow sticks worked well - connectors did NOT hold- cheaply made & not large enough.
customer_reviews.author: jessfarrell

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for what it was. I got these for our new year's celebration and the kids loved them. Some of the colors didn't work all that great, but it's not an expensive buy.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: wands don't bend easily to keep shape
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep kids busy at a wedding. They loved the idea of the glowsticks but the sticks don't bend easily into the glasses or the ball shape without pupping out.
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: Party time
customer_reviews.text: Used for a 50th birthday party. Everyone enjoyed. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Good for glow party!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s 6th birthday party, and it was a mega hit! Kids LOVED it! All sticks worked fine, and they lasted 12+ hours. There were a few connectors that didn’t work though.. although it didn’t bother me too much, this is something they definitely need to improve on.
customer_reviews.author: Mom from CA

customer_reviews.title: Would have preferred more sticks
customer_reviews.text: Only 200 sticks came and the rest were connectors and other things. I would have rathered have more glowsticks because that was what I assumed was the majority in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: A super kit to glow!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 8-year-old’s glow birthday party. My older daughters put the flowers, glasses, and balls together for the kids. Some were more challenging than others to get to go in while some didn’t want to stay in (this, the one star off- but I would give it a 9 on a scale of 1 to 10)
customer_reviews.author: Pammyroo

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun was had, after a five day camping trip I still had so many left over.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Some of the adapters were broken, but there is so much it didn’t matter. The kids had a blast playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Was super fun to have at my wedding. Came with all the peices amd the glow sticks worked really well!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great value, we have extras!
customer_reviews.text: Had a great time with these. Bought for a baby shower, and we have leftovera for later parties. The kids had so much fun putting them together and changing them. the glasses were fun, too.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They weren't really bright. But they worked and were ok
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: So many glowsticks
customer_reviews.text: All the frames are reusable but the glasses are a little hard to take the glowsticks out of once they’re spent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A whole bunch of them leaked during my daughter's party. Kids were complaining of burning and stinging sensation.
customer_reviews.author: RBS

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and product
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a fundraiser and sold out of these products! People kept asking for more.. The biggest hit were the sunglasses and glow balls. The bracelets were very hard to make and would not stay on the kids. We only had a few sticks not glow. I will buy again next year for the same event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't glow very long
customer_reviews.text: Glow only lasted about two hours. They were fun for about that amount of time. Then left around the house as useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T.

customer_reviews.title: They work great with only a few sticks in the dim side
customer_reviews.text: They work great with only a few sticks in the dim side. I wish the connectors were a bit longer or tighter so the bracelets would not pop open so easily. The sticks are still putting out light 2 days which is better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, just no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely loved making their own balls but I wish there were instructions on the glasses. Those were difficult to fit. Lasted for hours!
customer_reviews.author: MarthaL

customer_reviews.title: Great value good purchase 👌
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal !! It worked perfectly for our New years Eve Family Dance Party. The kids had a blast. They all worked, no duds. And they lasted a lot longer than I expected. Also I like that they were packaged into separate containers so I could use some right away and save some for later..
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my kids to go camping with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids to go camping with! They were a huge hit with them and all the neighbor camper kids Too! Plenty enough to share!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mlslibra85

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old had a glow in the dark party during her birthday sleepover and the kids loved it. They danced all night and this set comes with so many cool designs.
customer_reviews.author: Kaili

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was going to a neon lights party so got this for me and a few friends to make some awesome glowing costumes. While 200+ of the 400+ pieces are connectors the 200 glow sticks is still plenty. The pieces worked well and held together better than expected. Had a blast and just bought two more boxes for some other parties I have coming up down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Elon Packin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money won't stay together and alot don't glo.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: The connector coupling that holds the two ends together to ...
customer_reviews.text: The connector coupling that holds the two ends together to make a bracelet or necklace did not hold the ends together - immediately would come undone. Disappointing because I bought these to give to trick or treaters on Halloween and instead of bracelets, it was just tossed in their bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value. Great fun for people of all ages ...
customer_reviews.text: HUGE HIT!! Got them for my nephew's graduation party. Awesome value. Great fun for people of all ages by the time the bonfire rolled around. Would recommend for weddings, or any other kind of party.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bruchwalski

customer_reviews.title: Kid party success!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an outdoor 1st grade party. The party moved indoors due to rain, but the glow sticks were still a huge hit. Both kids and parents said they liked having so many different choices and connectors.
customer_reviews.author: msmoll91

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - some of the glow sticks
customer_reviews.text: Not bad - some of the glow sticks, several, didn't really light up as well as others - overall not bad and worked out well for the party we had.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena Dennison

customer_reviews.title: A fun project
customer_reviews.text: My 3 grandsons visited over the summer....both adults and young teens had a blast creating these for a night got time Glow pool party! They lasted a long time and it was one of the highlights of their visit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting. Kids had a blast at birthday party ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lighting. Kids had a blast at birthday party and when the light went out. I placed them around the house and on stairs and on the way to bathroom so no one would trip, lasted all night and more. Safer than candles.
customer_reviews.author: DesiDone

customer_reviews.title: Party Time
customer_reviews.text: We used for a glow birthday party. Everything looked wonderful
customer_reviews.author: S Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Low longevity
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but did not last the length of the party (2 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Short

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a birthday gift for my friends little girl.Great price and great product. Speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my friends little girl. She loves it and built some pretty cool objects out of it. Great price and great product. Speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great combo pack! Lots of fun at the bday party
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for outdoor movie night
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great value for a fun outdoor movie night! Product also was shipped fast. Lots of different ways to use the glow sticks
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Will get many uses!
customer_reviews.text: These are great glow sticks! Very bright with awesome color selection, and the kit comes with everything you need. Everyone love the glasses and triple bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The kids like these glo sticks at the party,but some of the connectors were missing to make some of the glasses necklaces and bracelets
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: If you have fun friends or kids party, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a well bought and thought out product. Great for parties with kids and adults. Gonna dress in black and stick them to me like a glow in the dark stick man, with a Weiner. 3 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: 2014 TW200

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pack! With the connectors to make balls, glasses and flowers, it is a wonderful deal! The sticks glow for hours. We didn't run across any duds. I'd certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the Halloween party
customer_reviews.text: wish it last longer but only 10 didn't worked and the rest started to fade but it the job
customer_reviews.author: Jordanjoshua

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend glow sticks to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glow sticks for my grandchildren to play with in the evenings while we were camping. The glow sticks were a big success even with some the adults, too. I would recommend glow sticks to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy N

customer_reviews.title: Fun but
customer_reviews.text: These were a fun bunch of Halloween treats but they didn't come close to the longevity that was advertised. Faded away in less than 4 hours, not the 8 to 10 hours that was claimed. Still, they were fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my party
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my party, sunglasses and all the different things you could do with them were great. However...out of the 200 glowsticks only about 130 or so worked. The rest didn't glow and I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More then plenty for the price. Still have half for next year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for holloween to give with candy. They just loved them. Good prize for the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Galaviz

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Take a little time to assemble but easy and a nice touch to a party
customer_reviews.author: john bockover

customer_reviews.title: Great for a black light party
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughters birthday party. Kids had a ton of fun making all sorts of things from this package. Package came on time and we thought this was a great price for all of the items that come in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Bayrard - CO

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Good price but glow sticks were smaller and thinner than I expected. They got the job done for our wedding, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition To Our Wedding Reception
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple sets of these for our wedding reception. They were great for everyone, from the kids to the grandparents. Was a nice addition on the dance floor and the photo booth. The glow lasted for a long time, and we had no issues with any of them at all.
customer_reviews.author: CRH

customer_reviews.title: Very fun set, the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a birthday and they loved it. Tons of glowsticks! Lots of connectors, they had a fun time making different things. All of the glowsticks worked too.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. I cracked 10 glowsticks and 5 of ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I cracked 10 glowsticks and 5 of The glow sticks were dripping neon liquid all over the place and staining everything! Cannot use them because In bought them for my children! Definitely return.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: This pack was the best!! The kids loved the different options of ...
customer_reviews.text: This pack was the best!! The kids loved the different options of glasses, balls, necklaces, headbands...they got super creative!
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: So many glowsticks for so little!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this with me into the club. Everyone had one by the end of the night, no one knew from where :)
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions, but simple enough to figure out how to assemble the glasses. Glow lasted much of the evening. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leon C

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's birthday and it was a big hit! Even the adults wanted necklaces and glasses made out of the glow sticks. Lots of small pieces in the box. I would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: This party kit was great success at glow in the dark theme party. plenty to be used for many times. I used only 70 out of 200 and so far all glow sticks were bright neon colored, lasted almost 36 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.D.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Used at a 4th of July party at night and they were INSANELY bright and great for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: the kids loved em and it really enhanced the party theme
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters Glow Party (9-12 yr olds). I was a little worried there wouldn't be enough. Boy was I wrong! the kids loved em and it really enhanced the party theme. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Icon1073

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy! Everything worked
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Everything worked. The only reason it's a 4star is because the glow sticks only came in red, green, yellow and orange. I was able to make different things with all of the glow sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Nidasmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties, camping and other nighttime/winter events
customer_reviews.text: Took these out for a glow party and discovered that we need these at every winter party we have. Will take them camping with us too. Each canister comes with 100 and provides hours of entertainment for the 3-10 crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of the North

customer_reviews.title: Great package for price
customer_reviews.text: Great package for the price. A lot of different options for your party. Loved that their was a mix for both boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great package. I brought this to a kids and family NYE party and everyone had a blast. For $20, it made our new year. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety ~ used their for my daughters glow in the dark party. They were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price. All of the ones we used word great!!
customer_reviews.author: Shionda evans

customer_reviews.title: Short 100 glow sticks
customer_reviews.text: Order only came with 100 glow sticks when it was supposed to have 200. Appears an entire tube is missing from the package. I needed for my daughters birthday party today. Gonna be some sad kids!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Bowling

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOO Many...
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow ;) this is more glow sticks than I can wave a glow stick at!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter’s glow party and the kids loved them! They glow very bright in the dark and for the price we’re worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: AssiahsMom

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!! We take them camping
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! We take them camping, in the desert. They were easy to put together and the connectors were not cheap. They didn’t not break easily either.
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter's 13 year old birthday party. Easy to assemble. Fast shipping. They were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Glowstick bundle
customer_reviews.text: This pack came with so much! We took them with us to go camping and they kids loved it and had so much to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Only half of the glow sticks worked.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the bulk size of 200 but was disappointed that only half of them worked. :( The half that DID work was great. I’m a teacher and used the glow sticks for a cosmic themed class. The girls loved the eyeglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Kids will use them camping in the spring and enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit at Middle School Dance
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's middle school had a dance with a glow-in-the-dark theme --- the glow sticks were a huge hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandkids to have some fun. Adults ended up having fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: People had fun building all the different objects
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a team building event at work.People had fun building all the different objects. Particularly the flowers.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMy SF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Elementary School Carnival Prizes!
customer_reviews.text: After darkness fell over our booth at our elementary school fall carnival, the kids kept coming back to play for more of these! An inexpensive, yet popular carnival prize
customer_reviews.author: David C. Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for wll that we got and the kids really had fun creating some cool toys!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Used them for a wedding and they lit up for a pretty long while. Just break and shake. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Deitra W.
